title: Nick Freaks Out About Top Gun 2 - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 05.31.18
description:
Thanks to Omaha Steaks for sponsoring this episode. Visit http://omahasteaks.com and enter KFGAMES in the search bar to get the Father's Day package.

Thanks to Brooklinen for sponsoring this episode. Get $20 off and free shipping with promo code GAMES at http://brooklinen.com

Nick and Tim talk about Top Gun 2, Matt Reeves’ Batman, and James Marsden’s face.

-Tom Cruise posts picture "feel the need" on twitter (16:15 mins)
-The Penguin could be the villian of matt reeves the batman (21:05 mins)
-James Marsden to star in sonic the hedgehog movie (23:40 mins)
-Silicon Valley discussion (31:10 mins)


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
